title: 28 Faces of the Moon
overview: Is it possible to love again after a devastating loss?Kang Woo is excited about starting his life with his fiancée Wol Ha, but his world turns upside down when Wol Ha dies just days before their wedding.Kang Woo is devastated and unable to get over the loss of his love. But when he meets Joo Hye, who looks a lot like his dead fiancée, can she help Kang Woo mend his broken heart and learn to love again?
